Instruction Decoder 1K x 16 ROM details

Address: 10 lines (A0 to A9)
A0 to A3: control logic to count steps (Steps T0-T5-same for all opcodes (fetch and decode instruction)
                                       (Steps T6 onwards execute the instruction)    
A4 to A7: program opcode 
A8 to A9: flags code [A8 = ZF (zero flag), A9 = CF (carry flag)]                           
			                                                     
Data: Control Words, 16 lines (D0 to D15)
D15: HLT Halt System			 D07: EO  Sum Out 
D14: MI  Memory Address Register In	 D06: SU  Subtract
D13: RI  RAM IN (always 0)		 D05: BI  'B' Register In
D12: RO  RAM Out 			 D04: OI  Output Register In
D11: IO  Instruction Register Out	 D03: CE  Count Enable (increment)
D10: II  Instruction Register In	 D02: CO  Program Counter Out
D09: AI  'A' Register In		 D01: J   Jump (Program Counter In), sets only if CF or ZF set 
D08: AO  'A' Register Out		 D00: FI  Flag Register In (elaborated in the program_count_up/count_down)  
					 If CF = 1, 'A' Register not updated
					 If ZF = 1, 'A' Register not updated
Addr	Addr Binary	Control Words
Hex     CZ OP   STEP   	
        FF CODE         H
        AA AAAA AAAA   	LMRRIIAAESBOCCJF 
	98 7654 3210   	TIIOOIIOOUIIEO I	A9(CF) and A8(ZF): the most significant bits determine which section the codes will jump to
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
						NOP, OPCODE 0000	A9 = CF (carry flag) = 0, A8 = ZF (zero flag) = 0
$0000	00 0000 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO (note: $0000 = 00 0000 0000)
$0001	00 0000 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0002	00 0000 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)   RO|II|CE
$0003	00 0000 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0004	00 0000 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO
$0005	00 0000 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0006	00 0000 0110	0000000000000000 (T6)
$0007	00 0000 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0008	00 0000 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0009	00 0000 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$000A	00 0000 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...						LDA, OPCODE 0001
$0010	00 0001 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO (note: $0010 = 00 0001 0000)  
$0011	00 0001 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0012	00 0001 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)   RO|II|CE
$0013	00 0001 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0014	00 0001 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO
$0015	00 0001 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0016	00 0001 0110	0001001000000000 (T6)   RO|AI
$0017	00 0001 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0018	00 0001 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0019	00 0001 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$001A	00 0001 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...						ADD, OPCODE 0010 
$0020	00 0010 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO 
$0021	00 0010 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0022	00 0010 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)   RO|II|CE
$0023	00 0010 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0024	00 0010 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO      
$0025	00 0010 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0026	00 0010 0110	0001000000100000 (T6)   RO|BI
$0027	00 0010 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0028	00 0010 1000	0000000100000000 (T8)	AO
$0029	00 0010 1001	0000000000000001 (T9)   FI (check carry flag) Max number 11111111 is 255, a number > 255 will set off carry flag 1 11111111
$002A	00 0010 1010	0000001010000000 (T10)  AI|EO ('A' Register need to be updated since number < 255, CF = 0)
...
...						SUB, OPCODE 0011
$0030	00 0011 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO 
$0031	00 0011 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0032	00 0011 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)   RO|II|CE
$0033	00 0011 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0034	00 0011 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO         
$0035	00 0011 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0036	00 0011 0110	0001000000100000 (T6)   RO|BI
$0037	00 0011 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0038	00 0011 1000	0000000100000000 (T8)   AO
$0039	00 0011 1001	0000000001000001 (T9)   SU|FI (check zero flag) Min number 00000000 is 0, a number = 0 will set off zero flag 00000000   
$003A	00 0011 1010	0000001010000000 (T10)  AI|EO ('A' Register need to be updated since number is not equal to 0, ZF = 0)
...
...						STA, OPCODE 0100
$0040	00 0100 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO 
$0041	00 0100 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0042	00 0100 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)   RO|II|CE
$0043	00 0100 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0044	00 0100 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO 
$0045	00 0100 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0046	00 0100 0110	0011000100000000 (T6)   RI|RO|AO   
$0047	00 0100 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0048	00 0100 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0049	00 0100 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$004A	00 0100 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...						LDI, OPCODE 0101 (not created) 
$0050	00 0101 0000	0100000000000100
$0051	00 0101 0001	0000000000000000
$0052	00 0101 0010	0001010000001000
$0053	00 0101 0011 	0000000000000000
$0054	00 0101 0100 	0100100000000000
$0055	00 0101 0101	0000000000000000
$0056	00 0101 0110	0000000000000000
$0057	00 0101 0111	0000000000000000
$0058	00 0101 1000	0000000000000000
$0059	00 0101 1001	0000000000000000
$005A	00 0101 1010	0000000000000000
...
...						JMP, OPCODE 0110 (Jump), sets only if CF or ZF set 
$0060	00 0110 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)   MI|CO
$0061	00 0110 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)   
$0062	00 0110 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)   RO|II|CE
$0063	00 0110 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0064	00 0110 0100	0100100000000010 (T4)   MI|IO|J 
$0065	00 0110 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0066	00 0110 0110	0000000000000000 (T6) 
$0067	00 0110 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0068	00 0110 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0069	00 0110 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$006A	00 0110 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...						JC, OPCODE 0111 (Jump carry)
$0070	00 0111 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)   MI|CO	                	
$0071	00 0111 0001	0000000000000000 (T1) 
$0072	00 0111 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)   RO|II|CE
$0073	00 0111 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0074	00 0111 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO [CF(carry flag) is not on, J is not on]
$0075	00 0111 0101	0000000000000000
$0076	00 0111 0110	0000000000000000
$0077	00 0111 0111	0000000000000000
$0078	00 0111 1000	0000000000000000
$0079	00 0111 1001	0000000000000000
$007A	00 0111 1010	0000000000000000
...
...						JZ, OPCODE 1000 (Jump zero)
$0080	00 1000 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)   MI|CO	
$0081	00 1000 0001	0000000000000000 (T1) 
$0082	00 1000 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)   RO|II|CE
$0083	00 1000 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0084	00 1000 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO [ZF(zero flag) is not on, J is not on]   
$0085	00 1000 0101	0000000000000000
$0086	00 1000 0110	0000000000000000
$0087	00 1000 0111	0000000000000000
$0088	00 1000 1000	0000000000000000
$0089	00 1000 1001	0000000000000000
$008A	00 1000 1010	0000000000000000
...
...
$0090   ......			Reserve
...
$00A0   ......			Reserve
...
$00B0   ......			Reserve
...
$00C0   ......			Reserve
...
$00D0   ......			Reserve
...
...						OUT, OPCODE 1110
$00E0	00 1110 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO 
$00E1	00 1110 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$00E2	00 1110 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$00E3	00 1110 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$00E4	00 1110 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO
$00E5	00 1110 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$00E6	00 1110 0110	0000000100000000 (T6)	AO
$00E7	00 1110 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$00E8	00 1110 1000	0000000000010000 (T8)	OI
$00E9	00 1110 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$00EA	00 1110 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...						HLT, OPCODE 1111
$00F0	00 1111 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO
$00F1	00 1111 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$00F2	00 1111 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$00F3	00 1111 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$00F4	00 1111 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO
$00F5	00 1111 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$00F6	00 1111 0110	1000000000000000 (T6)   HLT
$00F7	00 1111 0111	0000000000000000
$00F8	00 1111 1000	0000000000000000
$00F9	00 1111 1001	0000000000000000
$00FA	00 1111 1010	0000000000000000	
...
...			
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This section repeats the micro codes $0000 to $00FA. Only difference is JC, JZ, ADD and SUB 
						NOP, OPCODE 0000	A9 = CF (carry flag) = 0, A8 = ZF (zero flag) = 1
$0100	01 0000 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO (note: $0100 = 01 0000 0000) 
$0101	01 0000 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0102	01 0000 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)   RO|II|CE
$0103	01 0000 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0104	01 0000 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO
$0105	01 0000 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0106	01 0000 0110	0000000000000000 (T6)
$0107	01 0000 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0108	01 0000 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0109	01 0000 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$010A	01 0000 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...						LDA, OPCODE 0001
$0110	01 0001 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO (note: $0110 = 01 0001 0000)
$0111	01 0001 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0112	01 0001 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$0113	01 0001 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0114	01 0001 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO
$0115	01 0001 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0116	01 0001 0110	0001001000000000 (T6)   RO|AI
$0117	01 0001 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0118	01 0001 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0119	01 0001 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$011A	01 0001 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...                             		ADD, OPCODE 0010 
$0120	01 0010 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO
$0121	01 0010 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0122	01 0010 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$0123	01 0010 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0124	01 0010 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO
$0125	01 0010 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0126	01 0010 0110	0001000000100000 (T6)   RO|BI
$0127	01 0010 0111	0000000000000000 (T7) 
$0128	01 0010 1000	0000000100000000 (T8)	AO
$0129	01 0010 1001	0000000000000001 (T9)   FI (check carry flag) Max number 11111111 is 255, a number > 255 will set off carry flag 1 11111111
$012A	01 0010 1010	0000001010000000 (T10)  AI|EO ('A' Register need to be updated since number < 255, CF = 0)
...
...                             		SUB, OPCODE 0011
$0130	01 0011 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO 
$0131	01 0011 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0132	01 0011 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)   RO|II|CE
$0133	01 0011 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0134	01 0011 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO
$0135	01 0011 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0136	01 0011 0110	0001000000100000 (T6)   RO|BI
$0137	01 0011 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0138	01 0011 1000	0000000100000000 (T8)   AO
$0139	01 0011 1001	0000000001000001 (T9)   SU|FI (check zero flag) Min number 00000000 is 0, a number = 0 will set off zero flag 00000000  
$013A	01 0011 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)  'A' Register need not be updated since number is equal to 0, ZF = 1
...
...                             		STA, OPCODE 0100
$0140	01 0100 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO
$0141	01 0100 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0142	01 0100 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$0143	01 0100 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0144	01 0100 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO
$0145	01 0100 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0146	01 0100 0110	0011000100000000 (T6)   RI|RO|AO 
$0147	01 0100 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0148	01 0100 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0149	01 0100 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$014A	01 0100 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...						LDI, OPCODE 0101 (not created) 
$0150	01 0101 0000	0100000000000100
$0151	01 0101 0001	0000000000000000
$0152	01 0101 0010	0001010000001000
$0153	01 0101 0011	0000000000000000
$0154	01 0101 0100	0100100000000000
$0155	01 0101 0101	0000000000000000
$0156	01 0101 0110	0000000000000000
$0157	01 0101 0111	0000000000000000
$0158	01 0101 1000	0000000000000000
$0159	01 0101 1001	0000000000000000
$015A	01 0101 1010	0000000000000000
...
...                             		JMP, OPCODE 0110 (Jump), sets only if CF or ZF set 
$0160	01 0110 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO
$0161	01 0110 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0162	01 0110 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$0163	01 0110 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0164	01 0110 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO|J
$0165	01 0110 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0166	01 0110 0110	0000000000000000 (T6)   
$0167	01 0110 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0168	01 0110 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0169	01 0110 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$016A	01 0110 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...   						JC, OPCODE 0111 (Jump carry)
$0170	01 0111 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO
$0171	01 0111 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0172	01 0111 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$0173	01 0111 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0174	01 0111 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO [CF(carry flag) is not on, J is not on]
$0175	01 0111 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0176	01 0111 0110	0000000000000000 (T6)
$0177	01 0111 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0178	01 0111 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0179	01 0111 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$017A	01 0111 1010	0000000000000000 (T10) 
...
...						JZ, OPCODE 1000 (Jump zero) 
$0180	01 1000 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO
$0181	01 1000 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0182	01 1000 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$0183	01 1000 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0184	01 1000 0100	0100100000000010 (T4)	MI|IO|J [ZF(zero flag) is on, J is on]
$0185	01 1000 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0186	01 1000 0110	0000000000000000 (T6) 
$0187	01 1000 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0188	01 1000 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0189	01 1000 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$018A	01 1000 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...
...
$0190   ......			Reserve
...
$01A0   ......			Reserve
...
$01B0   ......			Reserve
...
$01C0   ......			Reserve
...
$01D0   ......			Reserve
...
...	                        		OUT, OPCODE 1110
$01E0	01 1110 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO 
$01E1	01 1110 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$01E2	01 1110 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$01E3	01 1110 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$01E4	01 1110 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO
$01E5	01 1110 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$01E6	01 1110 0110	0000000100000000 (T6)	AO
$01E7	01 1110 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$01E8	01 1110 1000	0000000000010000 (T8)	OI
$01E9	01 1110 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$01EA	01 1110 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...						HLT, OPCODE 1111
$01F0	01 1111 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO
$01F1	01 1111 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$01F2	01 1111 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$01F3	01 1111 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$01F4	01 1111 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO
$01F5	01 1111 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$01F6	01 1111 0110	1000000000000000 (T6)   HLT
$01F7	01 1111 0111	0000000000000000
$01F8	01 1111 1000	0000000000000000
$01F9	01 1111 1001	0000000000000000
$01FA	01 1111 1010	0000000000000000
...
...
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This section repeats the micro codes $0000 to $00FA. Only difference is JC, JZ, ADD and SUB  
						NOP, OPCODE 0000	A9 = CF (carry flag) = 1, A8 = ZF (zero flag) = 0
$0200	10 0000 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO (note: $0200 = 10 0000 0000) 
$0201	10 0000 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0202	10 0000 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)   RO|II|CE
$0203	10 0000 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0204	10 0000 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO
$0205	10 0000 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0206	10 0000 0110	0000000000000000 (T6)
$0207	10 0000 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0208	10 0000 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0209	10 0000 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$020A	10 0000 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...
						LDA, OPCODE 0001
$0210	10 0001 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO (note: $0210 = 10 0001 0000)  
$0211	10 0001 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0212	10 0001 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)   RO|II|CE
$0213	10 0001 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0214	10 0001 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO
$0215	10 0001 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0216	10 0001 0110	0001001000000000 (T6)   RO|AI
$0217	10 0001 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0218	10 0001 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0219	10 0001 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$021A	10 0001 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
... 						ADD, OPCODE 0010 
$0220	10 0010 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO 
$0221	10 0010 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0222	10 0010 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)   RO|II|CE
$0223	10 0010 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0224	10 0010 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO 
$0225	10 0010 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0226	10 0010 0110	0001000000100000 (T6)   RO|BI
$0227	10 0010 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0228	10 0010 1000	0000000100000000 (T8)	AO
$0229	10 0010 1001	0000000000000001 (T9)   FI (check carry flag) Max number 11111111 is 255, a number > 255 will set off carry flag 1 11111111    
$022A	10 0010 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)  'A' Register need not be updated, number > 255, CF = 1
...
...                             		SUB, OPCODE 0011
$0230	10 0011 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO
$0231	10 0011 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0232	10 0011 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$0233	10 0011 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0234	10 0011 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO
$0235	10 0011 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0236	10 0011 0110	0001000000100000 (T6)   RO|BI
$0237	10 0011 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0238	10 0011 1000	0000000100000000 (T8)   AO
$0239	10 0011 1001	0000000001000001 (T9)   SU|FI (check zero flag) Min number 00000000 is 0, a number = 0 will set off zero flag 00000000   
$023A	10 0011 1010	0000001010000000 (T10)  AI|EO ('A' Register need to be updated since number not equal to 0, ZF = 0)      
...
...                             		STA, OPCODE 0100 
$0240	10 0100 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO 
$0241	10 0100 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0242	10 0100 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)   RO|II|CE
$0243	10 0100 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0244	10 0100 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO 
$0245	10 0100 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0246	10 0100 0110	0011000100000000 (T6)   RI|RO|AO  
$0247	10 0100 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0248	10 0100 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0249	10 0100 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$024A	10 0100 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...						LDI, OPCODE 0101 (not created) 
$0250	10 0101 0000	0100000000000100 
$0251	10 0101 0001	0000000000000000
$0252	10 0101 0010	0001010000001000
$0253	10 0101 0011	0000000000000000
$0254	10 0101 0100	0100100000000000
$0255	10 0101 0101	0000000000000000
$0256	10 0101 0110	0000000000000000
$0257	10 0101 0111	0000000000000000
$0258	10 0101 1000	0000000000000000
$0259	10 0101 1001	0000000000000000
$025A	10 0101 1010	0000000000000000
...
...                             		JMP, OPCODE 0110 (Jump), sets only if CF or ZF set 
$0260	10 0110 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO
$0261	10 0110 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0262	10 0110 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$0263	10 0110 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0264	10 0110 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO|J
$0265	10 0110 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0266	10 0110 0110	0000000000000000 (T6)   
$0267	10 0110 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0268	10 0110 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0269	10 0110 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$026A	10 0110 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...						JC, OPCODE 0111 (Jump carry)	
$0270	10 0111 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO
$0271	10 0111 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0272	10 0111 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$0273	10 0111 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0274	10 0111 0100	0100100000000010 (T4)	MI|IO|J [CF(carry flag) is on, J is on]
$0275	10 0111 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0276	10 0111 0110	0000000000000000 (T6)
$0277	10 0111 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0278	10 0111 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0279	10 0111 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$027A	10 0111 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...						JZ, OPCODE 1000 (Jump zero)	
$0280	10 1000 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO	
$0281	10 1000 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0282	10 1000 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$0283	10 1000 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0284	10 1000 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO [ZF(zero flag) is not on, J is not on]      
$0285	10 1000 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0286	10 1000 0110	0000000000000000 (T6)
$0287	10 1000 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0288	10 1000 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0289	10 1000 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$028A	10 1000 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...
$0290   ......			Reserve
...
$02A0   ......			Reserve
...
$02B0   ......			Reserve
...
$02C0   ......			Reserve
...
$02D0   ......			Reserve
...
...                             		OUT, OPCODE: 1110
$02E0	10 1110 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO 		
$02E1	10 1110 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$02E2	10 1110 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$02E3	10 1110 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$02E4	10 1110 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO    
$02E5	10 1110 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$02E6	10 1110 0110	0000000100000000 (T6)	AO
$02E7	10 1110 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$02E8	10 1110 1000    0000000000010000  (T8)	OI
$02E9	10 1110 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$02EA	10 1110 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...						HLT, OPCODE: 1111
$02F0	10 1111 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO
$02F1	10 1111 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$02F2	10 1111 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$02F3	10 1111 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$02F4	10 1111 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO
$02F5	10 1111 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$02F6	10 1111 0110	1000000000000000 (T6)   HLT
$02F7	10 1111 0111	0000000000000000
$02F8	10 1111 1000	0000000000000000
$02F9	10 1111 1001	0000000000000000
$02FA	10 1111 1010	0000000000000000
...
...
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This section repeats the micro codes $0000 to $00FA. Only difference is JC, JZ, ADD and SUB  
						NOP, OPCODE 0000	A9 = CF (carry flag) = 1, A8 = ZF (zero flag) = 1
$0300	11 0000 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO (note: $0300 = 11 0000 0000) 
$0301	11 0000 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0302	11 0000 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)   RO|II|CE
$0303	11 0000 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0304	11 0000 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO
$0305	11 0000 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0306	11 0000 0110	0000000000000000 (T6)
$0307	11 0000 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0308	11 0000 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0309	11 0000 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$030A	11 0000 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...						LDA, OPCODE: 0001
$0310	11 0001 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO (note: $0310 = 11 0001 0000)  
$0311	11 0001 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0312	11 0001 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)   RO|II|CE
$0313	11 0001 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0314	11 0001 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO
$0315	11 0001 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0316	11 0001 0110	0001001000000000 (T6)   RO|AI
$0317	11 0001 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0318	11 0001 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0319	11 0001 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$031A	11 0001 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...						ADD, OPCODE: 0010
$0320	11 0010 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO 
$0321	11 0010 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0322	11 0010 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)   RO|II|CE
$0323	11 0010 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0324	11 0010 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO 
$0325	11 0010 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0326	11 0010 0110	0001000000100000 (T6)   RO|BI
$0327	11 0010 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0328	11 0010 1000	0000000100000000 (T8)	AO
$0329	11 0010 1001	0000000000000001 (T9)   FI (check carry flag) Max number 11111111 is 255, a number > 255 will set off carry flag 1 11111111       
$032A	11 0010 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)  'A' Register need not be updated, number > 255, CF = 1
...
...						SUB, OPCODE: 0011
$0330	11 0011 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO 
$0331	11 0011 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0332	11 0011 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)   RO|II|CE
$0333	11 0011 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0334	11 0011 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO 
$0335	11 0011 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0336	11 0011 0110	0001000000100000 (T6)   RO|BI
$0337	11 0011 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0338	11 0011 1000	0000000100000000 (T8)   AO
$0339	11 0011 1001	0000000001000001 (T9)   SU FI (check zero flag) Min number 00000000 is 0, a number = 0 will set off zero flag 00000000  
$033A	11 0011 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)  'A' Register need not be updated since number = 0, ZF = 1
...
...                             		STA, OPCODE: 0100 
$0340	11 0100 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO 
$0341	11 0100 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0342	11 0100 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)   RO|II|CE
$0343	11 0100 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0344	11 0100 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO 
$0345	11 0100 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0346	11 0100 0110	0011000100000000 (T6)   RI|RO|AO  
$0347	11 0100 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0348	11 0100 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0349	11 0100 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$034A	11 0100 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...						LDI, OPCODE 0101 (not created) 
$0350	11 0100 0000	0100000000000100
$0351	11 0100 0001	0000000000000000
$0352	11 0100 0010	0001010000001000
$0353	11 0100 0011	0000000000000000
$0354	11 0100 0100	0100100000000000
$0355	11 0100 0101	0000000000000000
$0356	11 0100 0110	0000000000000000
$0357	11 0100 0111	0000000000000000
$0358	11 0100 1000	0000000000000000
$0359	11 0100 1001	0000000000000000
$035A	11 0100 1010	0000000000000000
...
...                             		JMP, OPCODE: 0110 (Jump)
$0360	11 0110 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO
$0361	11 0110 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0362	11 0110 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$0363	11 0110 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0364	11 0110 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO|J
$0365	11 0110 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0366	11 0110 0110	0000000000000000 (T6)      
$0367	11 0110 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0368	11 0110 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0369	11 0110 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$036A	11 0110 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...   						JC, OPCODE: 0111 (Jump carry)
$0370	11 0111 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO		
$0371	11 0111 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0372	11 0111 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$0373	11 0111 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0374	11 0111 0100	0100100000000010 (T4)   MI|IO|J [CF(carry flag) on, J is on]  
$0375	11 0111 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0376	11 0111 0110	0000000000000000 (T6)
$0377	11 0111 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0378	11 0111 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0379	11 0111 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$037A	11 0111 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...						JZ, OPCODE: 1000 (Jump zero)	
$0380	11 1000 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO	
$0381	11 1000 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$0382	11 1000 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$0383	11 1000 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$0384	11 1000 0100	0100100000000010 (T4)   MI|IO|J [ZF (zero flag) on, J is on]   
$0385	11 1000 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$0386	11 1000 0110	0000000000000000 (T6)
$0387	11 1000 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$0388	11 1000 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$0389	11 1000 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$038A	11 1000 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...
$0390   ......			Reserve
...
$03A0   ......			Reserve
...
$03B0   ......			Reserve
...
$03C0   ......			Reserve
...
$03D0   ......			Reserve
...
...                             		OUT, OPCODE: 1110
$03E0	11 1110 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO 		
$03E1	11 1110 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$03E2	11 1110 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$03E3	11 1110 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$03E4	11 1110 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO    
$03E5	11 1110 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$03E6	11 1110 0110	0000000100000000 (T6)	AO
$03E7	11 1110 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$03E8	11 1110 1000    0000000000010000 (T8)	OI
$03E9	11 1110 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$03EA	11 1110 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...						HLT, OPCODE: 1111
$03F0	11 1111 0000	0100000000000100 (T0)	MI|CO
$03F1	11 1111 0001	0000000000000000 (T1)
$03F2	11 1111 0010	0001010000001000 (T2)  	RO|II|CE
$03F3	11 1111 0011	0000000000000000 (T3)
$03F4	11 1111 0100	0100100000000000 (T4)	MI|IO 
$03F5	11 1111 0101	0000000000000000 (T5)
$03F6	11 1111 0110	1000000000000000 (T6)   HLT
$03F7	11 1111 0111	0000000000000000 (T7)
$03F8	11 1111 1000	0000000000000000 (T8)
$03F9	11 1111 1001	0000000000000000 (T9)
$03FA	11 1111 1010	0000000000000000 (T10)
...
...
